description: images of children doing various activities; all photos are in a clear plastic sleeves; one photo in each sleeve with the exception of three: with one having two photos that are pasted together side by side, one having photos that are pasted front and back, with one photo being cropped, and one with a second small photo floating behind it in the sleeve
medium: Gelatin silver prints, chromogenic prints, and diffusion transfer (Polaroid)
title: Group of approximately 80 snapshot photographs
